name: Answers sent for review
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

Your answers have been sent to your ((partner)) to review. They need to review them and provide some of their own information by ((date of response)).  

You will receive a notification confirming when they have reviewed. If they do not respond then you will be told what you can do to progress the application. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)
subject: Your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)) has been sent to your ((partner)) for review
